meaning_str.bing:
n. 侦查；科学研究；学术研究
网络. 调查；调查研究；审查

侦查；科学研究；学术研究

调查；科学研究；学术研究；（正式的）侦查；探究；查究；审查；勘探；探讨；诊断（医学上的）

1.en: Mr. Obama may fear an investigation could inflame the kind of partisan divisions he has said he wants to avoid.
1.cn: 奥巴马可能担心，调查会进一步引发党派分歧，而他自己一直表示希望避免这种党派纷争。

2.en: Sin on Tuesday insisted that North Korea be allowed to conduct its own investigation of the site, a request so far refused by the South.
2.cn: 申善浩周二坚持说，应当允许朝鲜自己对现场进行调查。这一要求目前为止不为韩国同意。

3.en: That review is a part of the investigation that remains to be completed, he said.
3.cn: 他说，评估工作是调查的一部分，目前还未完成。

0.en: I won't have to. See, it's a homicide investigation now.
0.cn: 我没必要，现在是在调查凶杀案。

1.en: Anything you discuss should be part of my investigation.
1.cn: 你们谈论的一切都是我调查的一部分。

2.en: All right. Get me a copy and report on the investigation so far.
2.cn: 好吧，给我弄一份目前为止的调查报告。

3.en: We can try. No. My team will take over the investigation now.
3.cn: 我们可以试试。不行，现在由我的团队接手调查。

4.en: You can't assist an investigation anymore. What? What does that mean?
4.cn: 你不能再参加调查工作了。什么？这什么意思？

5.en: In the meantime, however, the investigation will not stop until we find Margot.
5.cn: 同时，调查不会停止直到我们找到玛戈。

6.en: Regardless, we have to follow up on all implications as part of our investigation.
6.cn: 先不管了，考虑各种可能性是我们调查的需要。

7.en: I would like to oversee those computer simulations. Not possible during an investigation.
7.cn: 我想旁观这些计算机模拟。调查期间可安排不了。

8.en: Once the investigation is complete, we'll be able to share the actual computer simulations.
8.cn: 调查一旦完成，我们将公开具体的计算机模拟结果。

9.en: Let me remind you, ma'am, the president was unconscious when this investigation began.
9.cn: 我要提醒你，女士，总统在这次调查开始前就已陷入昏迷……

10.en: Was there anything unusual about how you found her? To warrant an official investigation?
10.cn: 你们在她身上发现了什么特别之处么？以至于要让警方开始调查？

11.en: "Sources familiar with the investigation" sounds a lot more credible than "Anonymous person who texts me."
11.cn: "与调查有关的线人"听起来要比"匿名短信"可信得多

12.en: But all the flights you piloted before January 15th and every crash you investigated are not the purview of this investigation. Only US Airways 1549 matters today.
12.cn: 1月15号前，你飞过的所有航班之前你调查过的任何事故，都与这起调查无关，今天我们只关心全美航空1549。

13.en: Don't forget, she has a national profile after the Walker investigation. Truth and justice personified.
13.cn: 别忘了在沃克案调查后，她在全国也有点名气了，真理和正义的化身。

14.en: The state attorney general's office today expanded its pharmaceutical investigation to include Kael Pepper Laboratories.
14.cn: 州检察办公室今天扩大了药业调查范围，加入了奇尔·佩珀实验室。

15.en: I have read countless CVR transcripts of deceased pilots and I have significant accident investigation experience.
15.cn: 我读过无数牺牲机长的驾驶舱通话录音副本，也有相当多的事故调查经验。

16.en: Today, we begin with our operation and human performance investigation on the crash of US Airways Flight 1549.
16.cn: 今天我们先着手进行人员表现的调查涉及全美航空1549号航班的坠机事故。

17.en: Mr. Gatsby, exactly who are you, anyhow? I made an investigation into your affairs. You're one of Meyer Wolfshiem's bunch.
17.cn: 盖茨比先生，你到底是谁，我调查了一下你，你是跟迈耶·沃尔夫山姆一起的。

18.en: I've already spoken to her father. But at this point in the investigation, we are very confident that Ms. Kim's life was taken on her way out of town.
18.cn: 我已经通知过她的父亲。调查到这里，我们可以确信的是金女士已经遇难在她出城的路上。

19.en: So, you helped your son. I dumped the car in the lake. And took charge of the investigation. I convinced David his daughter ran away.
19.cn: 所以你帮了你的儿子。我把车丢到湖里。然后接手了这次案件的调查权。我让大卫相信他的女儿逃走了。
